item.title: Tree down - blocking cyclepath, 22nd September
item.description:
The A4o cycleway is almost completely blocked by a fallen tree. This has happened Cheltenham bound near the underpass
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Tree down - practically blocking cyclpath, 22nd September
item.description:
Heading into Cheltenham at the top of the rise from the underpass. Where the cyclepath dips away to the left a tree is down and is blocking the majority of the path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 21st September
item.description:
Street light outside 3 Oldbury Orchard not working for about a week. Road very busy with school traffic and pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oldbury Orchard, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 large bags of rubbish dumped, 21st September
item.description:
4 large bags of waste have been dumped in school lane, just inside the plot reserved for building next to the vicarage
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 of the 4 illuminated bollards have no covers. The covers are in the bushes by the Taylor Wimpey sign., 21st September
item.description:
There are no covers on the illuminated bollards.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree stump left after removal of tree, 21st September
item.description:
The tree was kindly removed by the council when a large branch broke and the trunk splintered. At the time the council workers assured our neighbours that the remaining trunk would be removed. This has not yet been done and is causing some concern to the neighbours who live closest to it. I promised to report it for them. Would it be possible for it to be removed please. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Cleeve Cloud Lane, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gulley lid is rattling, 21st September
item.description:
Opposite side of the road from Lorien. This will be at least the third time there has been a problem with this gulley in 3 years.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned sign - been here about 9 months, 21st September
item.description:
Abandoned sign left by contractors working in Wainlode Lane about 9 months ago! Reported twice before so this is the 3rd report.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A38, Norton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor
